description.en: Wrapped Conceal ($wCCX) Provides an untraceable gateway to and from the Ethereum ecosystem from the Conceal Network ecosystem. Wrapped Conceal ($wCCX) is simply an ERC20 token that represents the real Conceal coin $CCX on the Ethereum ecosystem. Having an ERC20 token representation allows Conceal Network to integrate into the Ethereum ecosystem, which includes wallets, dapps, and smart contracts.
